name: Fruit Hoop
description: Oh no! Fruit is falling from the sky!!! Catch the fruit in your hoop!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: Supports newer versions of OpenGL
